cause.description:
The Safe Families program is the only sizeable pornography prevention program that is targeting families from low-income, Black communities and Latino communities. We were able to distribute 74,055 free copies of our software last year. Workshops, keynotes, presentations, inspirational messages as well as filtering software are available at SafeFamilies.org.
1. Internet filtering for pornography and sexual addiction recovery.
2. Support for pastors and families in addressing sexual addiction.
cause.mission: Safe Families program provides resources for adults recovering from pornography addiction.
cause.name: Helping Adults with Sexual Addiction
